hero.title: Create Cinematic AI Videos with Native Audio ‚Äî Seedance 2.0
hero.description: The first AI video generator with native audio-visual sync. Seedance 2.0 generates multi-shot cinematic sequences from text, images, video clips & audio ‚Äî all in one prompt. 2K HD output, physics-based motion, and director-level camera control. No editing skills required.

showcase_grid.label: Powered by Seedance 2.0
showcase_grid.title: See What Seedance 2.0 AI Video Generator Can Create
showcase_grid.description: From high-speed action to intimate character stories ‚Äî every frame below was generated by Seedance 2.0's dual-branch diffusion transformer with native audio sync.

items.title: Physics-Accurate Motion
items.description: Seedance 2.0's Spatial-Temporal Causal Modeling (STCM) delivers motion that obeys real-world physics ‚Äî gravity, inertia, and object interaction. Watch tire spray, camera tracking, and debris flow with cinematic precision no other AI video generator can match.

items.title: Lifelike Character Animation
items.description: From subtle micro-expressions to full-body choreography, Seedance 2.0 brings AI characters to life with unprecedented naturalism. Powered by the dual-branch diffusion transformer, every gesture syncs perfectly with generated dialogue and audio.

items.title: Multi-Shot Character Consistency
items.description: Seedance 2.0 locks facial features, clothing textures, and body proportions across every angle and scene. This action-packed chase sequence maintains pixel-level character identity through wide shots, close-ups, and rapid cuts ‚Äî ideal for ads, short films, and branded video series.

items.title: Image to Cinematic Video with Audio
items.description: Upload a single photo and Seedance 2.0 transforms it into an immersive cinematic clip ‚Äî complete with native audio, dynamic camera movement, and atmospheric effects. The dual-branch architecture generates sound and vision simultaneously, eliminating the 'dubbed' feel of other AI tools.

items.title: Movie-Grade VFX & Action Sequences
items.description: Seedance 2.0 generates complex 3D action sequences with physically accurate motion, dramatic lighting, and blockbuster-quality visual effects. Cloth dynamics, fluid splashes, and impact physics rival professional CG studios ‚Äî all from a single text prompt.

introduce.title: What is Seedance 2.0
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: Our platform provides a user-friendly interface for Seedance AI video generation. We offer access to advanced text-to-video and image-to-video capabilities through third-party AI models. This is an independent service, not affiliated with model providers.

items.title: Text-to-Video Generation
items.description: Describe any scene in natural language and let Seedance 2.0 generate a fully rendered video with characters, environments, and dynamic motion.

items.title: Image-to-Video Animation
items.description: Upload any photo ‚Äî a product shot, portrait, or landscape ‚Äî and Seedance 2.0 breathes life into it with intelligent motion and cinematic effects.

items.title: Physics-Based Rendering
items.description: Advanced simulation technology models realistic object interactions, lighting, and material behavior for believable, production-ready output.

items.title: Ultra-HD Output
items.description: Export your creations in up to 2K high-definition with crystal-clear detail. No jitter, no artifacts ‚Äî just clean, professional video output.

features.title: What Makes Seedance 2.0 the Best AI Video Generator

faq.title: Seedance 2.0 ‚Äî Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Seedance 2.0 AI video generation.

items.question: What is Seedance 2.0?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 is a next-generation AI video generation model that uses a dual-branch diffusion transformer architecture to generate cinematic videos with native audio, multi-shot narratives, and physics-based motion from text, images, video clips, and audio references. Our platform provides independent access to this technology through a user-friendly interface.

items.question: What makes Seedance 2.0 different from Sora and Kling?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 is one of the first AI video models that generates audio and video simultaneously using a dual-branch architecture, achieving frame-level lip-sync accuracy. It supports up to 12 multimodal reference inputs, native multi-shot storytelling, and automatic camera planning. Sora focuses on physics simulation while Kling specializes in motion control ‚Äî Seedance 2.0 combines narrative, audio, and visual generation in one unified model.

items.question: Can Seedance 2.0 generate video with sound?
items.answer: Yes. Seedance 2.0 is one of the first AI video generators to produce native audio alongside video. The dual-branch diffusion transformer generates dialogue, sound effects, and music in parallel with the visual frames ‚Äî meaning audio is inherently synced to the action, not added as an afterthought. Lip-sync accuracy is within 1 frame.

items.question: How many reference inputs does Seedance 2.0 support?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports up to 12 simultaneous reference inputs: up to 9 images (for character, scene, and style reference), up to 3 video clips totaling 15 seconds (for camera and motion reference), and up to 3 audio files totaling 15 seconds (for rhythm and soundtrack reference), plus a text prompt.

items.question: What video resolutions does Seedance 2.0 support?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports up to 2K high-definition output. Multiple aspect ratios are available including 16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:3, and 3:4 to fit any platform ‚Äî from YouTube and TikTok to Instagram and cinematic widescreen.

items.question: How long are Seedance 2.0 generated videos?
items.answer: Generated videos range from 4 to 15 seconds with precision down to 1-second increments. A 15-second video typically generates in about 60 seconds ‚Äî 30% faster than previous versions.

items.question: What visual styles can Seedance 2.0 generate?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 supports a wide range of visual styles including photorealistic, anime, cyberpunk, watercolor, oil painting, 3D CG animation, and more. You can specify your preferred style in the text prompt or use image references to guide the aesthetic.

items.question: What is the relationship between this platform and ByteDance?
items.answer: This platform is an independent service that provides a user-friendly interface for AI video generation powered by Seedance 2.0. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by ByteDance. We leverage AI models through API integrations to provide our video generation services.

cta.description: Join thousands of creators using Seedance 2.0 to generate professional videos with native audio, multi-shot narratives, and physics-based motion. No credit card required.
